title: Sin City
description: Maxmillian Poole is the elegant, suave, and dominating owner of The Elite Poole, an exclusive personal security service that supplies model-esque bodyguards for the rich, famous, and influential of Sin City.His lover and employee, Ethan Winter, is the perfect match for Maxmillian both on the job and in bed. Easy going and amiable, he does whatever Maxmillian wants and rarely says no. But when Ethan does fight the reins, sparks fly.In their highly-charged relationship it means that their loving is as intense - and deliciously painful - as it needs to be.
author: Tricia Owens
